column1: The Purple Pig////It is a little on the pricier side for only tapas
column2: but it was great trying those 3 that seem to be some of the most popular dishes. The service was quick
column3: a little rushed since they want to get through the wait list as fast as possible it seems like. Also
column4: the food didn't all come out at once which wasn't that big of a deal but sometimes there's waits in between until the next one was ready.
